text: Zoolander is a 2001 American action comedy movie directed by Ben Stiller and starring Stiller, Owen Wilson and Will Ferrell. The movie is based on many short movies directed by Russell Bates and written by Drake Sather and Stiller for the VH1 Fashion Awards television specials in 1996 and 1997. It was a satire on the fashion industry. The movie received mixed to positive reviews from critics but was a box office success. A sequel, Zoolander 2, was released in February 2016. ==Cast== *Ben Stiller as Derek Zoolander *Owen Wilson *Will Ferrell as Jacobim Mugatu/Jacob Moogbern *Christine Taylor *Milla Jovovich *Jerry Stiller as Maury Ballstein *Jon Voight ===Cameos=== *David Bowie *Donald Trump *Billy Zane ==Production== Due to the then-recent September 11 attacks, Ben Stiller decided to digitally remove the World Trade Center out of respect. ==References== Category:2001 action movies Category:2001 comedy movies Category:2000s action comedy movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:Impact of the September 11 attacks Category:Movies directed by Ben Stiller Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Zoolander
